/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
